page.title: 12NEWBALANCE. E.E.TUBES
page.content:
{Newbalance}make athletics footwear.The factory opened in 1982. It employs 115 people.Who earn Â£105 per week.There are 63 women and 50 men .They work from 8.00am to 4.30.pm. They sell their products world wide. Their best running shoes cost Â£120.
{Ellay Enfield Tubes}make tubes for car radiators from brass copper and aluminium.It opened in 1971.35 people work there.34 men and 1 woman.The average wage is Â£80 per week.The raw materials come from Sweden.The products are sold world wide.
